actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The two-headed eagle makes two bite attacks and one talons attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the two-headed eagle can't use its talons on another target.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The two-headed eagle doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Two-Headed
special_abilities.desc: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

special_abilities.name: Wakeful
special_abilities.desc: While the two-headed eagle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.
